name: Shady's Poopong: 20th Anniversary Edition
description: Shady's Poopong: 20th Anniversary Edition was released in 2013 to commemorate 20 years since the inception of the rapping mutant gorilla, Shady. This 20th Anniversary Edition is a complete remake of 2006's Shady's Poopong, and introduces many new features such as power-ups. The original game is also included as a "Classic" mode, and the game also features two unlockable modes: Concept Mode, which emulates the original pre-production concept of the game, and Challenge Mode, a set of different tasks players must perform, including boss fights.
